labelById.333661: 4: La literatura romántica, realista y naturalista
labelById.333662: 5: La Generación del 98 y el Modernismo
labelById.333663: 6: Teatro y poesía del siglo XX
labelById.333665: 8: Escritores contemporáneos de Estados Unidos y España
labelById.333510: Skill Category 1: Analyze and/or interpret literary texts and audio sources in the target language.
labelById.333511: Skill 1.A: Read/listen to and comprehend literary texts.
labelById.333513: 1.A.ii: Summarize the plot of a literary text.
labelById.333514: 1.A.iii: Explain literary texts using supporting details.
labelById.333515: Skill 1.B: Identify the theme in a text.
labelById.333516: Skill 1.C: Identify or describe literary elements, voices, and stylistic features.
labelById.333519: 1.C.iii: Describe stylistic features (structure, setting, timeframes, characters, style, point of view, tone).
labelById.333520: 1.C.iv: Make distinctions between voices in order to establish differences in meaning.
labelById.333521: 1.C.v: Make distinctions between narrative voices and the author's perspective in order to establish differences in meaning.
labelById.333522: 1.C.vi: Make distinctions between stylistic features in order to establish differences in meaning.
labelById.333523: Skill 1.D: Identify perspective, attitude, or tone.
labelById.333524: Skill 1.E: Explain the function and/or the significance of rhetorical, structural, and stylistic features.
labelById.333525: 1.E.i: Explain the significance of points of view.
labelById.333526: 1.E.ii: Explain the relationship between the structure of a text and its content.
labelById.333527: Skill 1.F: Explain implied meanings or inferences.
labelById.333528: Skill 1.G: Explain perspective, attitude, or tone.
labelById.333529: Skill 1.H: Explain the development of a theme in a text.
labelById.333530: Skill 1.I: Connect themes or ideas to characters.
labelById.333531: Skill Category 2: Make connections between a literary text and a non-literary text or an aspect of culture.
labelById.333532: Skill 2.A: Identify cultural products, practices, or perspectives.
labelById.333533: 2.A.i: Identify cultural products in texts and visuals.
labelById.333534: 2.A.ii: Identify cultural practices in texts and visuals.
labelById.333535: 2.A.iii: Identify cultural perspectives found in texts and visuals.
labelById.333536: Skill 2.B: Explain the relationship between cultural products, practices, and perspectives of target cultures.
labelById.333537: 2.B.i: Explain how cultural products or practices relate to cultural perspectives in literary texts.
labelById.333538: 2.B.ii: Explain how cultural beliefs and attitudes affect the interpretation of a text.
labelById.333539: 2.B.iii: Explain the role of cultural stereotypes in texts.
labelById.333540: 2.B.iv: Explain the relationship between a literary movement and cultural perspectives.
labelById.333541: Skill 2.C: Relate target language texts to genres, periods, movements, and techniques.
labelById.333542: 2.C.i: Identify features of a literary genre.
labelById.333543: 2.C.ii: Identify features of literary periods, movements, historical and sociocultural contexts.
labelById.333544: 2.C.iii: Identify structural or rhetorical features in a text of the same period, genre or literary movement.
labelById.333545: 2.C.iv: Explain how the content and stylistic features of a text relate to a genre, period, or literary movement.
labelById.333546: 2.C.v: Explain how features of a text are characteristic of a genre, period, or literary movement.
labelById.333547: 2.C.vi: Identify the literary movement to which a text belongs.
labelById.333548: 2.C.vii: Explain how literary movements reflect their cultural and historical context.
labelById.333549: Skill 2.D: Situate textual language and registers within historical, social, and geopolitical contexts.
labelById.333550: 2.D.i: Identify examples of formal and informal language.
labelById.333551: 2.D.ii: Identify use of language registers to reflect social relationships in texts.
labelById.333552: 2.D.iii: Identify linguistic features representative of the time and place in which a text was written.
labelById.333553: 2.D.iv: Explain the relationship between linguistic changes and historical/geopolitical contexts.
labelById.333554: 2.D.v: Compare textual language and registers in texts produced in different historical, social, and geopolitical contexts.
labelById.333555: Skill 2.E: Relate texts to their contexts (literary, historical, sociocultural, geopolitical).
labelById.333556: 2.E.i: Identify information from other disciplines related to course content.
labelById.333557: 2.E.ii: Explain how a text's content relates to sociocultural, geopolitical, or historical contexts.
labelById.333558: 2.E.iii: Explain the relationship between a literary text and its sociocultural, geopolitical, and historical contexts.
labelById.333559: 2.E.iv: Explain how behaviors and attitudes present in texts reflect sociocultural geopolitical, and historical contexts.
labelById.333560: Skill 2.F: Relate texts to contemporary global issues.
labelById.333561: 2.F.i: Identify themes in a literary text that are relevant to contemporary society.
labelById.333562: 2.F.ii: Explain the relationship between themes found in literary texts and contemporary or global issues.
labelById.333563: Skill 2.G: Explain how a text reflects or challenges perceptions of a majority/minority culture.
labelById.333565: 2.G.ii: Explain how personal beliefs and opinions affect textual interpretation.
labelById.333566: 2.G.iii: Make connections between primary and secondary texts.
labelById.333568: Skill 3.A: Describe structural or stylistic similarities and differences in two texts.
labelById.333569: 3.A.i: Explain similarities and differences in rhetorical figures.
labelById.333570: 3.A.ii: Explain similarities and differences in points of view.
labelById.333571: 3.A.iii: Explain similarities and differences in stylistic features.
labelById.333572: 3.A.iv: Explain the function of structural features in texts related by period, genre, or theme.
labelById.333573: 3.A.v: Explain the effect of rhetorical features in texts related by period, genre, or theme.
labelById.333574: Skill 3.B: Compare cultural products, practices, or perspectives portrayed in two texts.
labelById.333575: 3.B.i: Explain how distinct points of view from two literary texts and cultures compare to points of view from their own culture.
labelById.333576: 3.B.ii: Explain how representations of cultural product, practices, or perspectives compare to their own literary culture.
labelById.333577: Skill 3.C: Identify thematic connections between texts.
labelById.333578: Skill 3.D: Compare the development of a theme in two texts.
labelById.333579: Skill 3.E: Compare the representation of historical events in two texts.
labelById.333580: Skill 3.F: Compare points of view in two texts.
labelById.333581: Skill Category 4: Compare a text to artistic representations.
labelById.333582: Skill 4.A: Relate texts to practices and perspectives found in a variety of media from the target cultures.
labelById.333583: 4.A.i: Identify themes and features of artistic representations.
labelById.333584: 4.A.ii: Describe similar themes and features between an artistic representation and a literary text.
labelById.333585: Skill 4.B: Situate texts within literary and artistic heritages of the target culture.
labelById.333586: 4.B.i: Explain the significance of similar themes and features found between an artistic representation and a literary text.
labelById.333587: Skill 4.C: Describe how a theme is developed in a work of art.
labelById.333588: Skill Category 5: Write a literary analysis.
labelById.333589: Skill 5.A: Present information in a descriptive form.
labelById.333590: Skill 5.B: Create a thesis that states the purpose.
labelById.333591: Skill 5.C: Organize information, concepts, and ideas in presentations with a logical and coherent progression of ideas.
labelById.333592: Skill 5.D: Elaborate and support main points with textual evidence.
labelById.333593: Skill 5.E: Use sources available in the target language to support the interpretation of texts and compare distinct viewpoints.
labelById.333594: Skill 5.F: Incorporate information from secondary sources related to texts in oral and written presentations.
labelById.333595: Skill 5.G: Use authorized reference materials in oral and written presentations.
labelById.333596: Skill 5.H: Acknowledge sources and cite them appropriately.
labelById.333597: Skill Category 6: Use accurate language and apply appropriate conventions of written language.
labelById.333598: Skill 6.A: Use a variety of vocabulary appropriate to literary analysis.
labelById.333599: Skill 6.B: Use a variety of grammatical and syntactic structures.
labelById.333600: Skill 6.C: Present and organize information logically.
labelById.333601: Skill 6.D: Produce a comprehensible written work by observing writing conventions of the target language.
labelById.333602: Skill 6.E: Use a variety of literary and critical terminology in oral and written discussions of texts in the target language.
